about_the_game:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

The scenario "Four Tribes, Six Countries" will be added.

▼Four Tribes, Six Countries
The barbarian tribes surrounding the central plains all attack at the same time.
As the Han dynasty faces an unprecedented peril, at Luoyang, Liu Bei, having safeguarded Emperor Xian, signals his counter-attack.
